metadata.title: CVE-2016-2485 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-06-01 does not validate OMXbuffer sizes for the GSM and G711 codecs, which allows attackers to gainprivileges via a crafted application, as demonstrated by obtainingSignature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 27793367.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
